document_data.mainbody:
elzound Street was a small road that was located in the city of Waterdeep.
Belzound Street was located in the southern section of Waterdeeps North Ward. The road branched south from Tarsars Street and joined with Suldown Street after a short distance.
A surface shaft connecting to Waterdeeps sewers was located along the midpoint of Belzound Street. The noble villa for the Roaringhorn family was located on the west side of the street.
